CustomField.description: Rolls up Closed/Won Opportunity totals to Contact records based on assigned Opportunity Contact Roles. Soft credit rollups only happen in nightly batches, but you can run them manually from the Rollup Donations Batch settings.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Allows you to rollup closed Opportunity totals based on Opportunity Contact Role Roles. Soft credit rollups happen only in the nightly batch job, and not on triggers. They can be manually run using the Opportunity Rollups tab.
CustomField.label: Enable Soft Credit Rollups
